title: MTG Still Champions Trump’s Agenda Amidst Congressional Turmoil
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: Americans know that Congress is grappling with escalating tensions, and on Thursday- illustrated by outbursts and scuffles, anyone who didn't...
content:
Americans know that Congress is grappling with escalating tensions, and on Thursday- illustrated by outbursts and scuffles, anyone who didn’t know it before- knows it now. The House of Representatives, in particular, has faced challenges, struggling to elect a speaker twice within a year amidst legislative gridlock and a surge in of betryal to the American people over dire problems like an invasion of the Southern border.

These divisions extend beyond party lines, with internal rifts that corporate media exploit. Recent calls from a few Republicans to remove Speaker Mike Johnson highlight the deepening divide, particularly over issues like the Ukraine aid package, where collaboration with Democrats is viewed as a deepening betrayal.

Greene’s failure to remove Johnson from his position on Wednesday, with only 11 House Republicans supporting the debate, showed the fractured nature of congressional politics today. While Greene garnered some support from Democrats opposed to Johnson’s politics, the overwhelming majority opted to table her motion.

In essence, these developments paint a picture of a Congress mired in division, where partisan interests often supersede a commitment to the American people’s agenda.

In a Thursday WarRoom interview,US Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) responded to what some people described as criticism from President Donald Trump regarding her approach to politics. When asked about Trump’s Wednesday call for unity after MTG’s Motion to Vacate Speaker Mike Johnson, Greene defended her actions, stating:

“I think President Trump did a good job with his statement last night. I really do. I think that he showed strong leadership for the entire Republican party but he also acknowledged that Mike Johnson is a good man… But he also acknowledged that he’s not necessarily standing with Mike Johnson’s speakership… I ran for Congress because Republicans didn’t support President Trump… I’m done with that Republican party… We’ve got to get this Republican majority in shape and actually fight… We still have a stolen election from 2020… Election integrity is the number one issue… President Trump has told me personally himself… I will not back off of my colleagues… I will continue to be a thorn in the side against them if they do not do everything they can to support his agenda and protect him.”

Greene emphasized her commitment to holding her party accountable to the values of American First, and supporting Trump’s agenda. She criticized the Republican leadership for not fully supporting Trump during his presidency and vowed to fight for election integrity. Greene also addressed the anger among constituents and urged them to support her efforts. She directed supporters to her social media for more information and assistance.

During the Greene segment, she doubled down on her goals, saying that she entered Congress due to the Republican abandonment of President Trump during his first term, exemplified by Speaker Paul Ryan’s failure.

Adding that she holds the GOP accountable for allowing the politicized pursuit of Trump by Robert Mueller’s special counsel.

MTG told Bannon that she would still try to reshape the Republican majority and ensure a fighting spirit.

Addressing the 2020 election, she emphasized the need for election integrity following concerns raised in recent Georgia hearings.

This steadfastness reflects her determination to advocate for our shared principles and restore integrity to Washington D.C.

For more context, watch the WarRoom segment:

title: BLM’s Legal Clash with Tides Foundation is a Rift over Civil Rights and Sharia Supremacy
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: Black Lives Matter Global Network Foundation has taken legal action against the Tides Foundation, a prominent progressive nonprofit, in a...
content:
Black Lives Matter Global Network Foundation has taken legal action against the Tides Foundation, a prominent progressive nonprofit, in a lawsuit that has sent shockwaves through the activist community. The lawsuit, demanding a staggering $33 million, alleges that the Tides Foundation has misappropriated funds intended for BLM, redirecting them towards activities unrelated to the organization’s core mission.

It appears that in the world of leftist nonprofits, there is a breakdown over the definition of “Civil Rights,” with Sharia Supremacy not being considered a legit grievance to BLM.

According to the lawsuit, Tides diverted funds intended for BLM to support anti-Israel protest groups and other political activities. Tides, a fiscal sponsor for various progressive organizations, including BLM, has been accused of deceptive practices and operating without proper oversight. The lawsuit highlights the complexities of managing donations and the importance of transparency and accountability in nonprofit organizations.

According to a New York Post article, at the heart of the controversy are accusations that the Tides Foundation, known for its substantial financial resources and liberal agenda, has diverted BLM funds to support causes not endorsed by the movement, causing jealousy to rise between different groups.

More specifically, the lawsuit claims that money meant to support the fight against racial injustice has been used to fuel anti-Israel protests on college campuses and finance other political endeavors.

From a BloombergLaw report on the matter:

“After the Black Lives Matter movement surged following the 2020 police murder of George Floyd, donations flowed to the BLM GNF nonprofit. Established in 2017 to center Black political advocacy and invest in Black communities, the organization didn’t have tax-exempt status. As a result, it enlisted the Tides Foundation, a left-leaning donor advised fund based in San Francisco, to help it accept donations, "parking” the funds with Tides.

Black Lives Matter said in its lawsuit that the Tides Foundation gave oral promises that the funds would be available to Black Lives Matter, as soon as it received its tax-exempt status. BLM ended its relationship with Tides in 2022, according to the complaint, and Tides has refused to transfer millions of dollars in funds to BLM, according to the complaint.

Tides manages over $1.4 billion in assets—more than many regulated community banks—allegedly acting like a bank without licensing, while preying on Black- and Brown-led organizations, according to the complaint filed Monday by the Black Lives Matter Global Network Foundation Inc. in California Superior Court, Los Angeles County.

In a 2020 oral contract, Tides led the nonprofit to believe that donations solicited toward a "collective action fund” were meant for BLM GNF and would be easily and readily available for distribution toward Black causes at the nonprofit’s request. Instead, Tides deliberately sent part of the funds to third-party organizations without BLM GNF’s authorization, the complaint said.”

Tides categorically denies the allegations and maintains its commitment to supporting racial justice groups, the organization said in an emailed statement that read:

“Resources in the Black Lives Matter Support Fund were never intended to be granted to large, well-funded national organizations like Black Lives Matter Global Network Foundation, and were always intended to be granted to local Black Lives Matter chapters,” the statement said.

The revelation of this legal battle has ignited a firestorm on social media, with reactions ranging from disbelief to amusement. Many users have seized upon the irony of two organizations with ostensibly aligned goals finding themselves at odds in such a public and contentious manner. Some have dubbed it a case of “scam artists suing each other,” while others have humorously referred to it as “commies suing the commies.”

Amidst the online chatter and speculation, the Tides Foundation has vehemently denied the allegations, dismissing the lawsuit as baseless and without merit. This defiant stance sets the stage for what promises to be a protracted and closely watched legal showdown, with significant implications for both organizations and the broader landscape of progressive activism.

The outcome of this legal battle remains uncertain, but the implications are profound. Beyond the immediate financial stakes, the lawsuit raises important questions about transparency, accountability, and the integrity of nonprofit organizations. As entities entrusted with advancing social justice causes, both BLM and the Tides Foundation are under intense scrutiny to ensure that their actions align with their stated missions and values.

title: Navigating the Landscape of Democrat’s Political Technology and Sharia Supremacy with Joe Hoft

content:

This change coincides with a surge in campaign spending on TV, including connected TV. Influencer marketing has gained traction, with major players utilizing both paid and unpaid influencers to reach voters online.

“The sophistication of the left, they got Silicon Valley, they have the Lords of easy money,” Steve Bannon, host of the WarRoom, said on Wednesday’s morning program, talking about the way the Democrats use technology against Republicans.

Political text messaging faces challenges due to declining contact rates, complex carrier policies, oversaturation, and scams. Campaigns are adopting technology earlier in the cycle, according to HGL’s 2022 Election Tech Survey. However, large mergers and acquisitions in key infrastructure raise uncertainties, particularly regarding the future of voter data infrastructure. While tech improves for down-ballot campaigns, many still lack affordable and effective tools despite experiencing electoral success, according to Higher Ground Labs.

Joe Hoft appeared on the WarRoom with Steve Bannon on Wednesday to discuss his findings about the long-time association of interconnected, taxpayer-assisted groups whose mission seems to be the aspiration of the United States of America.

“This piece is kind of frightening to tell you the truth. This is a highly organized apparatus to make sure they crush us and they steal elections. They’re not shy about this,” Hoft told Bannon.

Hoft, in the piece for Gateway Pundit titled, EXCLUSIVE: The Left’s ELECTION INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX Discovered and Defined, exposed the political technolical industry landscape from 2022.

Hoft and Bannon discussed the current political battle in America, which centers on the clash between what Hoft calls “the Left’s Election Industrial Complex” and their pursuit of fair and transparent elections.

Hoft talks about his beliefs that Conservatives debate voting logistics while clandestine, leftist entities manipulate election processes.

Hoft’s discovery of the 2022 Political Tech Landscape Report by Higher Ground Labs chart highlights this complex labyrinth of groups.

Hoft and Bannon agreed that the work of the leftist groups in framing challenges to elections,  such as voter suppression and misinformation, is the actual attack on democracy.

Bannon has been focused on conserving the American Republic from the attacks against the Judeo-Christian West for decades.  A highly pressing matter is for people to understand how the left is operating to push Sharia supremacy.  Bannon often talks about how platforms are conspiring to promote a foreign ideology to voters, to harm the Republic using funding and technology to reach people and shape public opinion about things like Sharia Law, which is expected to impact the 2024 elections, as he talked about in this clip:

Hoft exposed Higher Ground Labs, led by figures with left-leaning backgrounds, and talked about how they have access to technological innovation to aid left-leaning candidates. All of this is very challenging for the America First movement.

According to the Gateway Pundit reporting, the group’s inception likely predates its official launch, possibly receiving government funding during the Obama administration. The organization claims to support startups aiding candidates’ electoral success. The 2022 report reveals intricate connections within the Election Industrial Complex, involving nonprofits and publicly traded companies, mirroring a military-like operation. This setup echoes concerns voiced about the erosion of democracy in America.

When Obama was in office, it was about the time the Sharia Supremacy movement started in America as the “Transformation of America,” the “Hope and Change” of Obama’s supporters.

Gateway Pundit Breaking Exclusive: The Left’s Election Industrial Complex Discovered And Defined

title: Uniting Forces: Bannon’s Call to Action for the Republic, Mike Davis Responds
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: Uniting Freedom Forces: Bannon's Call to Action to Save the Republic Bannon was especially laser-focused in his escalation of action...
content:
Uniting Freedom Forces: Bannon’s Call to Action to Save the Republic

Bannon was especially laser-focused in his escalation of action against the enemies of the American Republic on Wednesday; his goal is to ignite action in the US House of Representatives in defense of  Presidential candidate Donald Trump and his MAGA supporters and replace Speaker Mike Johnson for empowering the uni party:

May 8 holds significant historical importance in World War II, marking the Victory date in Europe Day (V-E Day). On May 8, 1945, Nazi Germany officially surrendered, bringing an end to the war in Europe. This surrender followed the unconditional surrender of German forces to the Allies, which was signed on May 7, 1945, in Reims, France, by German General Alfred Jodl.

“Remember the turbulence of World War II brought.? Today we honor those folks,” Bannon said on the memorial marking of VE Day.

On VE day, Bannon laid out his case on the WarRoom for getting rid of Speaker Mike Johnson and RINOS once and for all. They are the enemies of Liberty as much as anyone on the left.

Consider this- WarRoom’s emblem, a divided shield brought together for a beautiful patriotic image, could symbolize the concept of two forces that founder Steve Bannon endeavors to unify through his daily programming, rallying them to save the republic.

Bannon’s often fervent rhetoric mirrors the urgency of the MAGA movement and our current political landscape, intertwining contemporary crises with echoes of historical conflicts like World War II.

Bannon’s impassioned call for action, from activists to Republican lawmakers, resonates with urgency, prodding Americans to confront threats to American civil liberties head-on and defend their freedoms with unwavering resolve.

Bannon’s frustration with the prevailing political climate is palpable, just as on Wednesday, when he denounced what he perceives as a “Neo-Marxist, illegitimate regime” led by Democratic President Biden. He paints a grim picture, alleging a vast criminal conspiracy against the Republican candidate for President, Donald J Trump, and his supporters. To Bannon, the stakes couldn’t be higher, likening the situation to the onset of a third world war.

Drawing upon historical parallels, Bannon invokes the spirit of the Allied invasion of Normandy, emphasizing the imperative of unity in facing adversaries.

His invocation of historical figures suggests an appreciation for their significance in shaping today’s challenges. Bannon’s rhetoric exhorts Republicans to shake off complacency and embrace their duty to safeguard Liberty.

“We must be on offense at all times.” Bannon insists, echoing his call for decisive action against threats.

Central to Bannon’s message is a clarion call for unity with like-minded patriots and vigilance in the face of existential threats to the republic.

“Hard calls have to be done by tough and hard people,” he emphasizes, urging Americans to confront challenges head-on.

The WarRoom aims to empower people to make those hard calls, just as Bannon has shown with the calls to vacate Speaker Mike Johnson.

“The easy decisions for the United States of America are behind us,” Bannon declares, urging his audience to brace themselves for the tough road ahead.

Bannon’s narrative draws strength from history’s lessons, inspiring collective action in defense of democracy. He evokes the spirit of past struggles, reminding Americans of their moral obligation to future generations. Despite any criticism, Bannon sees in President Trump a champion of the people, challenging the political establishment’s grip on power.

So, the Populist-Nationalist unity includes those who say they embrace democracy.

At its core, Bannon’s message on Wednesday is a rallying cry for long-term action—a call to arms to confront present challenges with courage and conviction.

He implores Republicans to seize the moment, make their case, and defend the republic against all threats. For Bannon and his audience, the future of America hangs in the balance, demanding a united front against forces seeking to undermine its fundamental principles.

Ultimately, Bannon’s daily speeches embody a sense of urgency and purpose, rooted in a belief in the power of collective action to shape history’s course.

And it is no different than what the Democrats do and have done through their use of Community Organizers in the past.

As populism clashes with elitism, Bannon sees an opportunity to bridge past and present, forging a path forward guided by history’s lessons. In his eyes, America’s soul is at stake, and it falls upon all Americans to rise to the challenge and defend the freedoms for which so many have sacrificed.

Unveiling Legal Battles: Trump’s Appeals and Allegations in Georgia and Florida

Bannon and Davis make a ferocious set of points against the Uniparty:

On Wednesday, Bannon’s guest, Mike Davis, appeared and highlighted exactly what the WarRoom posse audience needs to stay focused on.  As Bannon said, most people know that all they need to do to win- is not quit.

During the Wednesday conversation, Mike Davis discussed significant legal developments emerging from Georgia and Florida, highlighting the pivotal role of the court of appeals in President Trump’s legal battle. The court’s decision to hear Trump’s interlocutory appeal regarding the disqualification of Fulton County D.A. Fannie Willis, due to alleged financial improprieties, marked a turning point. Davis outlined allegations against Willis, including accusations of hiring her unqualified boyfriend, Nathan Wade, for exorbitant fees and billing for meetings with the Biden White House. He criticized what he perceived as a circus-like hearing, raising questions about the integrity of the case against Trump.

Davis emphasized the exceptional nature of the appeal, describing it as an “extraordinary appeal” occurring mid-prosecution. He criticized the handling of the case by a judge whom he deemed to have shown leniency toward Willis. Davis asserted that the entire Fulton County D.A.’s office must be disqualified due to conflicts of interest, alleging involvement extended to the Biden administration.

Moreover, Davis highlighted what he referred to as the “five pillars” of the case against Trump, outlining allegations involving key players such as Matthew Calangelo, Michael Cohen, and Judge Marshawn. He argued that these individuals, including Judge Marshawn’s daughter, Lauren, who is allegedly profiting from the trial, have tainted the legal proceedings against Trump. Davis condemned what he perceived as an unconstitutional gag order imposed on Trump, asserting that it violated his rights.

In Davis’s view, the case against Trump is part of a larger pattern of corruption and interference orchestrated by Democratic operatives. He criticized the lack of cohesive action from the House Judiciary Committee and the Weaponization Committee, urging them to take a more proactive stance. Davis’s remarks underscored the complexity and contentiousness surrounding Trump’s legal battles, reflecting broader concerns about the integrity of the justice system and the rule of law.

title: Election 2024:  Trump v. Biden—and Biden’s Replacement
author: DR. BRADLEY THAYER
excerpt: The 2024 election is different in so many ways, and the campaign has six months to go, so the twists...
content:
The 2024 election is different in so many ways, and the campaign has six months to go, so the twists and turns are just starting.  Key issues are Trump’s trials, election interference, the open borders and its consequences, inflation, deficit spending, the national debt, crime, the state of the public educational system, aggression from the People’s Republic of China (PRC), war in the Middle East and Ukraine—and that is just a partial list of weighty issues.

It will also be different because the Democrat elites might replace President Biden and Vice President Harris as their candidates at or after their August convention in Chicago.

They would do this because they have to keep Trump out of the Oval Office in January 2025.  Period.  That is the grand strategic objective of the DNC in 2024 (and January 2025 if the Democrats win the House).  They know they will lose with Biden heading the ticket—even with cheating.  Cheating might cover 2 or 3 percent, and in 2024 it may be larger, perhaps 4 percent, because among other measures Democrats will make sure illegal aliens vote.  It is a singularly remarkable fact in American politics that Biden is such a disaster as a president that it is questionable whether he could win even with a 3 or 4 percent steal.  In sum, Democrat victory is uncertain.

So he has got to go.  The Bidens do not want to go and certainly fought behind the scenes to stay.  But Obama & Co. have explained that what the Biden family wants is second to the Party’s interests.  That is always first for Democrats.  Fundamentally, Biden and Obama know that Trump’s return to the White House will reveal the truth.  Moreover, once Biden is out of office and Trump in office, Communist dictator Xi Jinping no longer has use for him, and so Xi will ensure that some of the truth at least of what Biden did is revealed.  Consequently, Biden has an acute personal interest in stepping aside given his disastrous performance, charisma of a pet rock, absent enthusiasm among the Party faithful, and poll numbers that may yet enter the single digits, to ensure that someone else is elected.  More and more Americans are cognizant that the Biden presidency is something they stepped in and are trying to scrape off the bottom of their shoe.

Assuming Biden’s health lasts, the timing of his announcement will have to be at Chicago or just after to minimize the time Biden is a lame duck and to get on the ballot in all 50 states.  The convention will be his valedictory where he will be feted just before the party leaders bring out the old shepherd’s hook of Vaudeville theater days to yank him off the stage.  "Give ‘im the hook,” was the refrain for bad acts at Miner’s Bowery theater, and it will echo once again for a truly atrocious politician at the Chicago convention.  No doubt, the American people wish they could have a hand in "giving ‘im the hook.”  But they will be denied that satisfaction.

Instead, on November 5, 2024, they will have a "Candidate X,” or the "Mystery Candidate,” as yet unknown, but likely going to be Gavin Newsom or Michelle Obama.  The advantages of this are massive for the Democrats.  That candidate can disown the Biden administration completely.  In essence, the Democrats will turn the page.  Disowning, disavowing, and burying Biden in real time while they proclaim the solution is at hand.  Whatever Biden did, our Mystery Candidate will promise the opposite between August and November 2024.  If Bidenomics destroyed the economy, Candidate X will promise to fix all problems.  If Biden opened the border, our mystery candidate will promise "comprehensive” reforms, including closing the border while providing path to "coming out of the shadows.”  If Russia is at war with Ukraine, there will be peace.  There will be a new "New Deal” or "New Frontier” or some adjective linked to noun that will promise to be the solution to all of the problems Biden caused.

This greatly complicates Trump’s campaign as he will have to run against Biden until dramatically, he will not.  He will have to rapidly re-tool to run against Newsom or Obama.  The time compression will make it difficult to portray Newsome or Obama accurately as the ruthless and odious politicians they are—and the continuation with a new face of Biden’s policies.  But for most Americans they may be blank page or even some may be positively inclined, at least to Obama.  They will not have Biden’s baggage; they will promise to solve all problems; and will have a tsunami of support from the media who will gin up excitement.  They will win back some support Biden has lost in that wave of excitement.  How much is a critical question.  At the same time, Biden will continue what he has been doing, employing the White House and Department of Justice to attack Trump.  Trump will have to run against Biden and Obama or Newsom simultaneously.  Biden can be the "bad cop” while Newsome or Obama play the "good cop” and the bright future that will come with their presidency, and the dark days of the Trump, and dare they say it, Biden years, will be over.

This election year will be historic in every respect.  But its broad outlines, including the Democrat’s candidate, are as yet unknown.  Surprise and dramatic changes are certain.  Every election is a climb, but this is Everest.  Trump’s challenges, are already prodigious, will become even greater.  Trump, the campaign, and Trump supporters have to be prepared for and possess equally an unyielding and indefatigable determination coupled with a dynamic flexibility to best whatever is in the Democrats’ bag of tricks and the inevitable domestic and global tribulations.  This is right here.  Right now.  There is no second chance.

Bradley A. Thayer is a Contributing Columnist for Warroom and is @bradleythayer on Gettr and Truth, and @bradthayer at X.  He is the coauthor with James E. Fanell of Embracing Communist China:  America’s Greatest Strategic Failure.

title: Matt Gaetz Challenges Prison Denial for Peter Navarro Interview, Draws Bannon’s Ire [Call to Action]
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: US Rep. Matt Gaetz, a member of the House Judiciary Committee, went viral Monday night for demanding transparency over the...
content:
US Rep. Matt Gaetz, a member of the House Judiciary Committee, went viral Monday night for demanding transparency over the Federal Bureau of Prisons’ refusal to grant him an interview with Peter Navarro. He cited Navarro’s designation as “too notorious” for such interaction, which got Steve Bannon’s attention—and not in a pleasant way.

“Notorious” refers to being widely known or famous, typically for some unfavorable or negative reason. It often implies a reputation for wrongdoing or scandal.

Gaetz questioned this rationale, noting that even infamous figures like John Gotti have been interviewed while incarcerated. Gaetz underscores the injustice of Navarro’s treatment, including being denied access to legal representation, amid questionable charges linked to the January 6 committee. Gaetz discussed the urgency of rectifying this situation, especially in light of potential political motivations and the anticipation of President Trump’s return to office.

Navarro, a former White House adviser, has become the first high-ranking official from the Trump administration to be incarcerated due to the events of January 6, 2021. He received a four-month sentence for contempt of Congress after refusing to comply with a subpoena, citing executive privilege, which was rejected.  Navarro has served two months.

Questions have arisen regarding Navarro’s treatment and whether he is being held as a political prisoner. It is customary for House members to investigate such concerns. Reportedly, Navarro is not mail, visitors, or allowed access to his attorney.

During a speech on Monday night, US Rep. Matt Gaetz defended Navarro on the House floor. His remarks sparked controversy, with Steve Bannon, the host of WarRoom, demanding significant repercussions in response to Gaetz’s statements.

Bannon is calling for immediate action.

Bannon called for immediate action, demanding the dismissal of Colette Peters, the director of the Federal Bureau of Prisons and insisted that Peters should be summoned before Congress to address Navarro’s mistreatment and expressed frustration with the lack of response from lawmakers, particularly citing Speaker Mike Johnson.

He condemned the notion that Navarro was deemed “too notorious” for interviews, branding him a “purely political prisoner” and urging congressional hearings for accountability.

Bannon blasted the treatment Navarro has received, stating:

“And this is one of the reasons McCarthy and Johnson and everybody should have gotten to work on this right away. The WarRoo is calling for the immediate dismissal of the director of the Federal Bureau prisons, Colette Peters. We want her immediate dismissal. She should be hauled before Congress, this afternoon. And this is one of my problems with Johnson is that he knows that Matt Gates made that speech.

He knows that Matt Gates had talked to people in the House and told them that Peter Navarro was not being allowed to be interviewed by Gates because he’s notorious. Then he’s purely a political prisoner. It’s a misdemeanor,Lady. Why are we not starting Tuesday with her in the hot seat in front of a house committee?”

KEY POINT:

No specific law grants US House members the right to visit prisoners in jail to interview them. However, as elected representatives, members of Congress have oversight responsibilities, including monitoring the conditions of prisons and ensuring the fair treatment of individuals within the criminal justice system.

House members may utilize their authority to request visits or interviews with prisoners as part of their oversight duties. These requests may be made formally or informally, depending on the circumstances, and the decision to grant access typically rests with the relevant authorities, such as the prison administration or the agency overseeing federal facilities. Additionally, regulations and procedures may govern such visits, ensuring security and compliance with legal standards.

Bannon underscored the gravity of Navarro’s situation, highlighting that he is incarcerated for a misdemeanor related to defending executive privilege and opposing the “sham” January 6 committee.

Check it out:

WATCH: Steve Bannon GOES OFF on Federal Bureau of Prisons Director for denying my request to interview @RealPNavarro because he’s too "notorious”

"Why is Colette Peters not in front of a congressional committee TODAY?

Why are we not demanding her resignation TODAY?

Why are… https://t.co/j8pLfmVLr5 pic.twitter.com/6UzEY1lFIr

— Rep. Matt Gaetz (@RepMattGaetz) May 7, 2024

Resources: 

Collette S. Peters Federal Bureau of Prisons

BillBlaster Ap to contact Congress

Matt Gaetz’s Committees 

House Judiciary Committee

The US House Judiciary Committee is one of the oldest standing committees in the House of Representatives and holds a wide range of responsibilities related to law, justice, and constitutional matters.

Some of its key responsibilities include:

  1. Oversight of the federal judiciary: The committee oversees the administration of the federal courts, including the Supreme Court, lower federal courts, and the judicial branch as a whole.
  2. Legislation related to the judiciary: The committee considers and reviews bills and resolutions about federal courts, judgeships, judicial procedures, and legal matters.
  3. Impeachment proceedings: The Judiciary Committee plays a critical role in the impeachment process by investigating misconduct allegations against federal officials, drafting articles of impeachment, and recommending whether impeachment charges should be brought before the full House.
  4. Constitutional issues: The committee examines constitutional questions, including matters related to civil liberties, constitutional amendments, and the separation of powers among the branches of government.
  5. Oversight of the Department of Justice: The committee conducts oversight of the Department of Justice, including its agencies such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF), and the Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA).
  6. Civil liberties and civil rights: The committee addresses issues related to civil liberties, civil rights, and human rights, including discrimination, voting rights, privacy rights, and due process.
  7. Overall, the Judiciary Committee plays a critical role in shaping and overseeing the United States’ legal framework and ensuring the justice system’s proper functioning.

Bannon is right to demand answers for why a member of the Judiciary Committee is being denied access to interview a man who is incarcerated for a misdemeanor for being too scandal-ridden to care about.

title: Trump Classified Documents Trial Delayed Indefinitely, Cannon Extends Document Deadline
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: U.S. District Judge Aileen Cannon, a Trump appointee, recently extended a key deadline in President Donald Trump's criminal trial for...
content:
U.S. District Judge Aileen Cannon, a Trump appointee, recently extended a key deadline in President Donald Trump’s criminal trial for allegedly mishandling White House documents. This indefinitely paused a requirement that Trump disclose what classified materials his legal team plans to introduce at trial.

This decision marks the latest in a series of delays by Judge Cannon, which resulted in the trial being postponed without a new date being determined.

Trump’s legal team has argued that Special Counsel Jack Smith and government prosecutors mishandled evidence by moving documents out of order within the boxes seized from Trump’s Mar-a-Lago estate.

The Justice Department has not responded to a request for comment on the latest delay, and it is currently unclear when Judge Cannon will set new deadlines for the classified documents disclosures or when the trial will start.

“According to a Tuesday Forbes report, Cannon issued a brief order Monday night pausing a deadline—originally set for Thursday—that requires Trump to disclose what classified materials his legal team plans to introduce at trial.

That filing is important because it tees up a potential legal battle over what classified materials can be used at trial, former prosecutor Joyce Vance noted, which The New York Times points out could take months in itself to resolve before the case can go to trial.”

That is not the only problem for Trump’s opponents.

In Julie Kelly’s most recent report, titled “The DOJ’s Doctored Crime Scene Photo of Mar-a-Lago Raid” from the “Declassified with Julie Kelly,” Kelly reported:

“DOJ and the media have lied about the infamous photo of alleged classified documents seized during FBI raid of Mar-a-Lago. New court filings prove the FBI used cover sheets depicted in the photo during the raid.”

Kelly, a constant WarRoom source of information on J6 trials and the numerous lawfare cases against President Trump, was focused for this report on new disclosures in Special Counsel Jack Smith’s espionage case against Donald Trump. The disclosures reveal that the FBI tampered with evidence to create a controversial photo and that the DOJ has allegedly lied about it for nearly two years.

The article highlights several key points:

1)The controversial photo was taken after the FBI raid of Mar-a-Lago in August 2022. It shows classified documents with colored cover sheets.

2) The DOJ’s use of the photo was misleading, as the cover sheets were not “recovered” in the container but were instead used as placeholders by the FBI.

3) The FBI agents’ handling of the documents raises questions about their security clearance, the documents’ classification status, and the accuracy of the placeholders.

4) There are discrepancies between the placeholders and the documents, and the physical boxes’ contents do not match the FBI’s accounting.

Special Counsel Jack Smith might have significant problems due to these revelations.

title: Colonel Derek Harvey Gives Insights on Unrestricted Warfare and Urgent Call for Action
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: Colonel Derek Harvey, a distinguished military strategist and former National Security Council staffer during President Donald Trump's administration, recently shared...
content:
Colonel Derek Harvey, a distinguished military strategist and former National Security Council staffer during President Donald Trump’s administration, recently shared his perspectives on the escalating challenges facing the United States in the context of unrestricted warfare. In a conversation with Steve Bannon on the WarRoom, Harvey highlighted the need for a comprehensive approach to address the growing threats to the country, both domestically and internationally.

Unrestricted Warfare:

“Unrestricted Warfare” is a concept introduced in a book titled “Unrestricted Warfare: China’s Master Plan to Destroy America.” It was written by two Chinese colonels, Qiao Liang and Wang Xiangsui, and published in 1999. The book discusses unconventional methods that countries, particularly China, could use to challenge and defeat more technologically advanced adversaries like the United States. It proposes strategies such as economic warfare, cyber attacks, terrorism, and psychological operations as means to achieve military objectives without engaging in traditional armed conflict. The term “unrestricted warfare” implies a departure from conventional rules of engagement and the use of diverse tactics across various domains to achieve strategic goals.

From the book’s description:

“A sobering and fascinating study on war in the modern era, Unrestricted Warfare carefully explores strategies that militarily and politically disadvantaged nations might take to successfully attack a geopolitical super-power like the United States. American military doctrine is typically led by technology; a new class of weapon or vehicle is developed, which allows or encourages an adjustment in strategy. Military strategists Qiao Liang and Wang Xiangsui argue that this dynamic is a crucial weakness in the American military, and that this blind spot with regard to alternative forms warfare could be effectively exploited by enemies. Unrestricted Warfare concerns the many ways in which this might occur, and, in turn, suggests what the United States might do to defend itself.

The traditional mentality that offensive action is limited to military action is no longer adequate given the range of contemporary threats and the rising costs-both in dollars and lives lost-of traditional warfare. Instead, Liang and Xiangsui suggest the significance of alternatives to direct military confrontation, including international policy, economic warfare, attacks on digital infrastructure and networks, and terrorism. Even a relatively insignificant state can incapacitate a far more powerful enemy by applying pressure to their economic and political systems. Exploring each of these considerations with remarkable insight and clarity, Unrestricted Warfare is an engaging evaluation of our geopolitical future.”

Harvey emphasized the urgent need to understand and counter unrestricted warfare, a term used to describe the comprehensive and integrated approach to conflict that goes beyond traditional military means. This type of warfare encompasses economic, psychological, and informational dimensions, making it difficult for conventional military capabilities to maintain global peace and security.

The Domestic Front: A New Battleground

In the discussion, Harvey pointed out the increasing influence of foreign actors and ideologies on American society, particularly on college campuses. He highlighted the role of China, through platforms like TikTok, in shaping public opinion and exacerbating domestic tensions. Harvey also expressed concerns about the influx of foreign students and the funding of academic programs by foreign governments, which he believes are intended to influence outcomes and shape American culture.

The Need for Action: A Comprehensive Strategy

To counter unrestricted warfare, Harvey called for a focused effort by the U.S. government to address the threats posed by foreign influence and domestic unrest. He suggested public hearings, investigations, and defunding programs that do not align with American interests. He also stressed the importance of a common set of talking points and a unified approach by Republican leaders to address these issues effectively.

title: Legal Maze Explained: Davis Exposes the Intricacies of the Trump Prosecution

content:

Yet she has never had any consequences. Neither has Joe Biden or Hunter Biden.

The question is, why are Democrats Joe Biden, Hillary Clinton, and Hunter Biden allowed to have scandalous amounts of susceptible documents in their possession, and Republican Donald Trump is being prosecuted for having classified documents he IS allowed to have?

HILLARY CLINTON AND HUNTER BIDEN HAVE PROBLEMS WITH CLASSIFIED DOCUMENTS THEY WERE NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE

 Hillary Clinton’s Email Server Scandal:

  • Despite attempts to destroy evidence, the server was likely hacked by foreign entities, including China and Russia.
  • The Obama administration feared the exposure of Clinton’s corruption before the 2016 election, leading to the Crossfire Hurricane investigation.

Hunter Biden’s Laptop Controversy:

  • The CIA and former Intel officials labeled it as Russian disinformation, leading to censorship by significant media outlets.
  • President Trump filed a civil lawsuit against Hillary Clinton for Russian collusion, revealing judicial bias and conflicts of interest.

Legal Maneuvers and Unanswered Questions:

  • Magistrate Judge Bruce Reinhardt’s recusal from Trump’s lawsuit against Clinton raised suspicions of bias.
  • The lack of privacy review and withholding of Crossfire Hurricane records underlined government opacity and potential cover-ups.
  • The Mar-a-lago raid symbolized the misuse of legal instruments to target political adversaries, emphasizing the need for accountability and transparency.

Davis’s parallels between Clinton’s email scandal and the Hunter Biden laptop controversy underscore systemic problems within the entire judicial system. On Friday, he emphasized the urgency of the US House addressing judicial bias and government overreach to uphold democratic principles.

Davis clearly showed the importance of public awareness of these topics because the media does not explain these complex issues to Americans.

Davis also points to Joe Biden having an instrumental part in designing the lawfare against Trump to cover up and to persecute Trump and deny Trump his civil rights:

Here’s a timeline of key points discussed, along with essential quotes and the full interview is below:

1. Davis draws urgency to this being week four of the Criminal Prosecution of Trump

  • Davis highlights the significance of this being the first criminal prosecution of a former president.
  • The prosecution stems from Trump’s indication of running for president again, leading Democrats to initiate a lawfare campaign against him.

2. Davis highlights how this lawfare started with an unlawful seizure of presidential records

3. Davis pushes for bolder Republican response

  • Davis applauds Republican politicians for starting to show backbone but emphasizes the need for more action.
  • He calls for indictments to cut off federal funding to states and local governments prosecuting Trump.
  • Quote: “It’s good to see that these Republican politicians… are starting to find their backbones, but a lot more needs to be done.”

4. Davis urges more urgency for House Republicans

  • Davis urges House Republicans to issue aggressive subpoenas for witnesses and documents to uncover the conspiracy against Trump.
  • He stresses the need for public hearings and staff depositions to expose the truth.
  • Quote: “Let’s start bringing in these witnesses and their documents… and then fight it in court.”

5. Davis defines the situation as a Criminal Conspiracy

  • Davis accuses the Biden White House and various state officials of engaging in a criminal conspiracy against Trump.
  • He calls for action from House Republicans to combat this conspiracy.
  • Quote: “This is a criminal conspiracy… It’s a zero-sum game, and they are on offense.”

6. Davis outlines Illegal Activities by Hillary Clinton

  • Davis discusses Hillary Clinton’s illegal use of a home server containing classified information and evidence of corruption.
  • He parallels Clinton’s actions and the cover-up of Hunter Biden’s laptop.
  • Quote: “This was a Trump campaign dirty trick colluding with the Russians… They did the same play in 2020 with Hunter Biden’s laptop.”

7. Misuse of Legal Process

  • Davis points out the misuse of legal processes, such as the Espionage Act, to target Trump and cover up the Obama-Biden administration’s wrongdoing.
  • He highlights conflicts of interest and unethical behavior among judges and officials involved.

title: FLYNN MOVIE: Delivering Truth Amidst Turmoil, The General’s Journey Through Persecution and Patriotism
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: Teeing up the trailer to his new movie, Flynn the Truth, during a WarRoom interview with host Steve Bannon,  General...
content:
Teeing up the trailer to his new movie, Flynn the Truth, during a WarRoom interview with host Steve Bannon,  General Mike Flynn, who wrote a blazer over a dark t-shirt which peaked out with the words “Deep State” emblazoned across his chest like this flight with them is tattooed on his soul, tossed out some breaking news to set the stage for the interview.

Flynn, on a road tour to promote his movie and meet the public, told Bannon that he had been served eight subpoenas just the night before. The pursuit of Flynn seems neverending.

After the story he told Bannon about his journey from battlefields to conference rooms since 2015, those subpoenas seemed like a small thing. The historic persecution Flynn and his family have faced since his very brief time in the Trump administration is astounding.

What started with Obama and continues today is the foundation for his latest project, which he explained to Bannon, who was also on the Trump administration at the time.

“Obama told President Trump to stay away from Michael Flynn; he is bad news,” echo the words from the movie’s trailer.

WATCH THE FULL MOVIE WITH THE SPECIAL WARROOM LINK:

Flynn, a retired United States Army lieutenant general, served as the 24th U.S. national security advisor for a brief period at the beginning of the Trump administration.  Flynn had a distinguished military career, contributing significantly to U.S. counterterrorism efforts and playing pivotal roles in Afghanistan and Iraq.

Flynn first made national news by contradicting Obama when Obama said that the US should not fear ISIS because they were the “JV” Team.

Now, Flynn is a historical figure in the unfolding current events in the United States because of his background, experiences, and service as a high-ranking Democrat General. He is seen as dangerous for his relationship with Donald Trump and because he was one of President Obama’s favorites until he could not be persuaded to lie for the establishment.

There may be no more incredible warrior behind Trump for the America First agenda than Flynn.

A little flashback:

Flynn was just as frank with Bannon as he had been to America about Obama.

Flynn appeared with Bannon on Thursday to discuss his movie and lay the foundation for his continuing historic service to the nation.

Bannon asked Flynn on Thursday how America got to this point in history with Marxist invasions on college campuses and lawfare against trop Trump associates and how he felt about years of Obama and his associates personally going after him.

But unwilling to pass the opportunity to smash the Deep State, Flynn tuned his answer not to reflect on his personal tribulations but to focus his feelings about the usurpations he had seen, and he answered:

“Well, the first reason we ended up here today is that Donald J. Trump decided to run for president in the United States, and he beat the Heir Apparent to the Communist regime, Hillary Clinton. That’s number one. Okay. Don’t forget any War Room audience, is that possible? Don’t forget!  Because once that happened their plans to take this country over got shattered. And right now, the American people, this populist movement in our country, are sick and tired of it. They went after Trump so hard, they went after me and that is why we are here.”

COULD FLYNN BE CHOSEN AS TRUMP’S VICE PRESIDENT?

Flynn took the opportunity to rock the WarRoom again. When asked by Bannon if he would accept President Trump’s invitation to be his vice-presidential candidate, Flynn took a brief pause, likely filled with flashbacks from political and legal persecution against him and his family, and answered that he would indeed accept.

WATCH THE FULL WAR ROOM INTERVIEW:

New Movie Tells The Story Of The Deep State Targeting General Michael Flynn For Exposing Corruption

THE MOVIE TIES IN WITH BREAKING CURRENT EVENTS

The film “FLYNN, Deliver the Truth, Whatever the Cost” provides insights into the deep-seated corruption and weaponization of certain government agencies, particularly the CIA and the FBI, as highlighted by the experiences of General Michael Flynn. The film suggests a broader and alarming picture of how these organizations operate and the extent to which they can be manipulated for political or other purposes, as Flynn reminded his Twitter audience recently:

“I hope the whole WarRoom audience will watch this important movie,” Bannon said on Thursday.

title: Smith’s Criminal Election Interference Alleged: Complaint Against US Special Counsel
author: KARI DONOVAN
excerpt: A complaint was filed against US Special Counsel Jack Smith with the Department of Justice's Office of Professional Responsibility, accusing...
content:
A complaint was filed against US Special Counsel Jack Smith with the Department of Justice’s Office of Professional Responsibility, accusing him of illegal election interference by hastening the prosecution of President Trump to affect the 2024 election.

According to US Rep Elise Stefanik (R-NY), Smith allegedly violated DOJ policy by seeking a speedy trial and bypassing standard procedures, evident in his pursuit of an early trial date and a pretrial writ of certiorari.

A pretrial writ of certiorari is significant because it allows a case to bypass the normal appellate process and be heard directly by a higher court, typically the Supreme Court.

In the context of the complaint against Jack Smith, seeking a pretrial writ of certiorari before judgment is critical because it accelerates the legal process, potentially leading to a faster resolution of the case. This could have significant implications, especially in cases with political undertones, as it could expedite the trial and influence the outcome before an impending event such as a presidential election.

By attempting to obtain a pretrial writ of certiorari, Smith is being accused of aiming to expedite the legal proceedings against President Trump so that they impact the 2024 election.

Furthermore, Stefanik said, Smith disregarded a court-ordered stay, serving discovery documents despite the stay’s mandate.

In her letter, she calls for an investigation into Smith’s conduct, asserting it undermines the Justice Department’s integrity and constitutes an attempt to sway the election.

During a Tuesday morning press conference, Stefanik made statements highlighting her concerns over what is perceived as a politically motivated prosecution led by Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg against former President Trump.

She alleges that the case against Trump is “weak and baseless” and “that the American people know it.”  Stefanik alleges that Bragg’s motives against Trump are driven by partisan motives rather than legal merit because he bypassed the case until the emergence of someone named Michael Colangelo from Democrat Joe Biden’s team began pushing it.

“It is crystal clear from the opening arguments in this case and the evidence that this weak case is blatant lawfare and election interference during the height of the presidential campaign,” Stefanik said Tuesday morning to open her press conference.

As reported in the WarRoom to Steve Bannon, Colangelo is the very same person who made the opening statement:

Stefanik repeated that Bragg’s actions constitute unfair election interference, particularly given the trial’s timing during a presidential campaign and amidst a crime crisis in New York.

On Tuesday, Mike Davis from Article Three project gave his reaction to Stefanik’s statements, saying that the Stefanik complaint against Smith alleges violations of long-standing Justice Department policy prohibiting prosecutorial decisions based on elections.

In more detail about the timing, Davis said that Stefanik’s letter outlines Smith’s alleged interference in the 2024 election by rushing to prosecute Trump, adding that despite waiting 30 months to bring charges, Smith demanded a trial within five months, despite the case’s complexity.

“He sought an extraordinary petition for cert before judgment, then changed position, suggesting blatant election interference,” Davis said.

The news of the complaint comes on the same day the judge in the case has fined Trump $9,000.00 and threatened a presidential candidate with jail time.

Davis taunts the judge to imprison Trump, alleging civil rights violations and calling the case corrupt. Watch the full Davis segment for more context:

Mike Davis Responds To Democrat Judge Merchan Threatening President Trump With Jail Over Gag Order

Multiple people have cited the involvement of a Biden-appointed official, Colangelo, in Bragg’s office numerous times as evidence of political bias. Additionally, the statement criticizes the judge’s connections to Biden and alleges unconstitutional actions, such as a gag order.

Stefanik ended her Tuesday remarks by announcing an official complaint against Joe Biden’s special counsel for alleged election interference and calls for an end to what is characterized as unjust political witch hunts against Trump.

Watch a short clip of the Stefanik Press conference here:

Read Stefanik’s letter here:

Full Stefanik press conference on Bannon’s WarRoom for fuller context

See the WarRoom’s prior coverage to Smith, and other Julie Kelly investigations, as Steve Bannon has led the WarRoom audience to demand an investigation into a potential Criminal Conspiracy against President Trump and his supporters:

Criminal Conspiracy Probes Needed by Congress into Shock Revelations about Jack Smith
